review: Awesome little player for my TV needs!  YouTube, Netflix and Kodi are all I use on the Chromecast and couldn't be any happier!  You can also mirror your smartphone (I have an S4) onto the big screen and works in portrait and landscape depending on how you hold your phone.  Kodi does not have a chromecast icon so, to get around it, I just mirrored it from my phone to the TV and works fine, although the sound appears to be lagging which does not bother me.  I have two of these devices and love it!
